abstract: New York Times first mentioned Sigmund Freud on Sept 21, 1909, and his name has been referenced nearly 300 times since then.
snippet: A search of The Times database from the early 1920s until Freud’s death in 1939 yields nearly 300 references to him and almost 1,000 to psychoanalysis, first mentioned in the newspaper as “psychanalysis.”
lead_paragraph: A search of The Times database from the early 1920s until Freud’s death in 1939 yields nearly 300 references to him and almost 1,000 to psychoanalysis, first mentioned in the newspaper as “psychanalysis.”
